title: paravasha naTam
sahitya:
paravasha naTam purivOm deiva bhaktiyuDanE citta shuddhiyuDanE pADi


anupallavi

  muraLI gAna vilOlA gOpAlA enrE mOhamuDanE Atma dAhamuDanE kUvi


caraNam    ariyAda mUDhargaL parihAsam sheidAlenna Attiram koNDavar aDittu vaidAl enna
veri koNDa ulagattai veruttut-turnadu sukham viLaikkinra shAntanai mIrA kAntanai eNNip-
